messages.subject: Parent self esteem
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/7/03 4:28:33 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/7/03 4:28:33 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I have been in therapy more less for the last decade. And it is
helpful. But I'm not "there" yet in terms of my feelings about myself. >>

I don't know if you're spiritual or not, so just ignore this if it doesn't
interest you.
But some things that helped me personally, were Deepak Chopras writings,
especially "The Path to Love".
Also Sara Ban Breathnachs "Simple Abundance" and "Excavating your Authentic
Self"
Very helpful to me.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
